quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Las Vegas and Loathing
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, stars, roul. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: Besides friendship, what is the relationship between Roul Duke and Dr. Gonzo in the movie Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dr. Gonzo is Dukes attorney

questions.question: Which of these stars does not have a cameo in Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Jim Carrey

questions.question: What 1973 movie won the Oscar for Best Picture at the 46th Academy Awards ceremony in 1974?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Sting

questions.question: What 1970 movie was honored with an Academy Award for Best Picture at the 43rd Academy Awards in 1971?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Patton

questions.question: Before Johnny Depp did it in Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas, which famous actor portrayed a character based on Hunter Thompson in the movie Where the Buffalos roam?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Bill Murray

questions.question: This 1971 film was the winner of the Pest Picture Oscar at the 44th Academy Award ceremony in 1972.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The French Connection

questions.question: Who was supposed to direct Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas, before Terry Gliliam took over?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Alex Cox

questions.question: At the 45th Academy Awards in 1973, this 1972 movie received the prestigious Academy Award for Best Picture.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Godfather

questions.question: In the beginning of  the movie Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas, the main characters pick up a hitch-hicker. He has a T-Shirt with artwork by the illustrator of the book, Ralph Steadman, printed on it. What is the drawing on his T-shirt of?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mickey Mouse

questions.question: What is the name of The Rolling Stones song, mentioned in the book Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas, that couldnt be used in the movie version, because there wasnt enough money to buy its rights?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Sympathy for the Devil

questions.question: What is the initial purpose of Roul Dukes trip  to Las Vegas in the movie Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas?

options.text: He is supposed to write an article on The Mint 400 motorcycle race for a sports magazine
He is there to participate in The Mint 400 motorcycle race
He is there to make a drug deal

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: He is supposed to write an article on The Mint 400 motorcycle race for a sports magazine

questions.question: Several actors were considered for the part of Roul Duke in Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas before Johnny Depp. Which of these is not among them?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Ed Harris

questions.question: Throughout the movie Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas,  the main characters Duke and Gonzo use a variety of mind-altering substances. What is the name of the drug they take, that doesnt really excist?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Adrenochrome

questions.question: The movie Fear and Loathing in Las Vegas is based on the eponymous book, written by this famous counterculture author and journalist.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Hunter S. Thompson

questions.question: This 1974 film was the winner of the Academy Award for Best Picture at the 47th Academy Awards in 1975.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Godfather Part II

questions.question: What 1978 movie received the Oscar for Best Picture at the 51st Academy Awards ceremony?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Deer Hunter

questions.question: This 1976 film was honored with the Oscar for Best Picture at the 49th Academy Awards ceremony in 1977.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Rocky

questions.question: The first Ewok you see in Star Wars is called Wicket W Warrick.

questions.question: What 1996 horror movie is this quote from: So sad... how it can only be ruined... the rest of your life can only spoil what weve made... the idea that every second theyre just... rotting away. Can you live with that? I dont think you can.?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Dentist

questions.question: Which of these nominated movies was the winner of the Oscar for Best Picture at the 48th Academy Award ceremony in 1976?

options.text: One Flew Over the Cuckoos Nest

questions.question: Does Christopher Walker play Count Dooku in episodes 2 and 3 of Star Wars?

questions.question: This 1979 film won the Academy Award for Best Picture at the 52nd Academy Awards in 1980.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Kramer vs. Kramer

questions.question: Who plays Luke Skywalker in Star Wars: Episode 4?

questions.question: What 1997 film is this quote from: Evolution has a way of keeping things alive.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Mimic

questions.question: Identify the 1999 movie from the quote: Decided to whip up one of my own - a group so hungry for money theyd do anything. I thought youd be more comfortable with your peers.

questions.question: What 1990 movie contains the following exchange:

questions.question: How many youthful offenders were housed at the Wilkinson Home for boys in the film Sleepers?

options.text: I Know What You Did Last Summer

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Night Flier

questions.question: What 1995 movie is this quote from: You ever watched a man die? If you watch very closely, you can sometimes see the soul escaping. And if youre very quick, you can catch it.?

quizzes.title: Entertainment Quiz: Malone and Movie
quizzes.description: Test your entertainment knowledge with this comprehensive quiz! Features 15 questions covering Entertainment, actor, bollard. Includes 5 easy, 5 medium, and 5 challenging questions. Can you achieve a passing score of 70%?

questions.question: This 300 lb character actor is part of the Burt Reynolds inner circle of actors and had a brief role on Reynolds Evening Shade program from 1991-1993. In Malone, he plays a bully that gets his butt kicked on a bridge by Malone, played by Burt Reynolds.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Dennis Burkley

questions.question: In the movie Malone, this actor played Charles Delaney, a local bigwig bent on taking land throughout the area in a patriotic real estate scheme.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cliff Robertson

questions.question: This character actor was always the authoritative, bespectacled, bald pompous guy in TV sitcoms. He was Lumpys father in Leave It to Beaver, Mel Cooley on The Dick Van Dyke Show and Elmer Zellerbach on I Love Lucy. He played a newscaster in Rabbit Test.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Richard Deacon

questions.question: At the end of the movie Malone, Jo Barlow, who was infatuated with Malone, reminded him that in five years she would be five years older. Burt Reynolds character replied, So will I.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: Lauren Hutton, who starred in the movie Malone, played Fiona McNeil in two episodes of Nip/Tuck.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: True

questions.question: TV fans know her best as Mrs. Edna Garret from The Facts of Life but she also played Cousin Claire in Rabbit Test.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Charlote Rae

questions.question: This actress played the daughter of a Vietnam War vet, who repairs Malones mustang in the 1987 film Malone.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Cynthia Gibb

questions.question: What did Bernhard Zondek and Selmar Ascheim have to do with the movie Rabbit Test?

options.text: They were the doctors who invented the rabbit test.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: They were the doctors who invented the rabbit test.

questions.question: In what 1987 horror movie does this conversation occur:
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: The Stepfather

questions.question: Who was the male lead in Rabbit Test?
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Billy Crystal

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Lauren Hutton

questions.question: In the movie Malone, Burt Reynolds character had previously worked for this organization before going to the Pacific Northwest with his ailing Ford Mustang.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: C.I.A.

questions.question: This short in stature actor played one of the Bollard brothers, who was killed by the protagonist, Richard Malone, in the barbershop.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: Tracy Walter

questions.question: In the movie Malone, Scott Wilson plays the part of Paul Barlow, the mechanic who is being pressured to sell out by Devaney. Wilson has also played Sam Braun in 9 episodes of this crime show drama.
questions.explanation: The correct answer is: CSI: Crime Scene Investigation

questions.question: Which is  true about the final scene of Rabbit Test?

options.text: Gary Shandlings character becomes a stand-up comedian.
It is staged as a Nativity scene.
The United Nations declares the films star a World Citizen for saving  the world from starvation.
The rabbit farmer become President of the United States.

questions.explanation: The correct answer is: It is staged as a Nativity scene.
